pillar.title: Economics, Finance, Contracting and Business Structures
pillar.definition: Money flows, billing, coding, revenue cycle, entity structures, 1099 economics, practice models (PE, MSOs, agencies), negotiations, stipends, subsidies, financial strategy for providers and organizations.
inclusion_tests: Is this about how money moves or how business entities are structured in anesthesia?
exclusion_tests: Education, wellbeing, ethics, clinical practice, professional identity.
